title: Digital Thread Data Schema
description: Schema for validating JSON files used to describe entities that should be added to the digital thread.

$schema.description: The JSON Schema URI for validation

hardwareItems.description: Collection of hardware items used to take measurements

operators.description: Collection of operators who performed test operations

softwareItems.description: Collection of software items used to take measurements

testAdapters.description: Collection of test adapters (fixtures, interface boards, or mechanical setups)

testStations.description: Collection of test stations where tests are executed

uuts.description: Collection of Unit Under Test (UUT) definitions

uutInstances.description: Collection of specific UUT instances with serial numbers

testDescriptions.description: Collection of test descriptions defining tests for specific UUTs

Extensions.description: Extension fields as string key-value pairs for custom metadata

HardwareItem.description: Represents the metadata of a hardware item used to take measurements

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this hardware item from other entities

manufacturer.description: The manufacturer or vendor of the hardware item

model.description: The model name or number of the hardware item

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the hardware item

partNumber.description: The part number of the hardware item

assetIdentifier.description: The asset identifier for tracking and inventory purposes

calibrationDueDate.description: The date when calibration is due for the hardware item

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this hardware item

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

Operator.description: Represents the metadata of an operator who performed test operations

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this operator from other entities

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this operator

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

SoftwareItem.description: Represents the metadata of a software item used to take measurements

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this software item from other entities

product.description: The product name of the software item. Should only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, underscores, parentheses, and periods. Must begin and end with a letter or number.

version.description: The version of the software item

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this software item

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

TestAdapter.description: Represents a test adapter, fixture, interface board, breakout box, mechanical fixture, or connection adapter used to hold, connect, or interface the UUT with the test system

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this test adapter from other entities

name.description: The name or label for the test adapter

manufacturer.description: The manufacturer or vendor of the test adapter

model.description: The model number or name of the test adapter

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the test adapter

partNumber.description: The part number of the test adapter

assetIdentifier.description: The asset identifier for tracking and inventory purposes

calibrationDueDate.description: The date when calibration is due for the test adapter

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this test adapter

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

Test.description: Represents the metadata of a test definition

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this test from other entities

description.description: Explanation of what the test does

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this test

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

TestStation.description: Represents the metadata of a test station where tests are executed

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this test station from other entities

name.description: The name of the test station

assetIdentifier.description: The asset identifier for tracking and inventory purposes

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this test station

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

Uut.description: Represents the metadata of a Unit Under Test (UUT) model or type

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this UUT from other entities

name.description: The name of the UUT model

partNumber.description: The part number of the UUT

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this UUT

family.description: The UUT family or product line

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

UutInstance.description: Represents the metadata of a specific UUT instance with a unique serial number

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this UUT instance from other entities

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the UUT instance

manufactureDate.description: The date the UUT instance was manufactured

firmwareVersion.description: The version of the firmware on the UUT instance

hardwareVersion.description: The hardware version of the UUT instance

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this UUT instance

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

uutAlias.description: Alias reference to the parent UUT model or type

TestDescription.description: Represents the metadata of a test description defining a test for a specific UUT

alias.description: Optional alias identifier for referencing this test description from other entities

name.description: The name of the test description

link.description: A URI to a resource that further describes this test description

schemaId.description: The unique identifier of the schema that applies to this instance's extensions

uutAlias.description: Alias reference to the UUT this test is designed for
